text: 6.12 1 Ko 9.25-26, 1 Ti 1.18, 2 Ti 4.7 Bɨ Klays nop gos kɨles tɨmel gɨl nɨgup ak, ne bɨ kabɨyam tɨmel yɨbɨl tek mɨdeb. Gos ne kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl mɨdeb. Anɨb ak tek nep agebin, gos nad ak kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl nɨŋɨd, gos nɨgtep gɨl gɨnɨmɨn. Ned won ak God nep aglɨl, pel pelnep yenɨmɨn agɨl dɨnɨg gek, binɨb kuŋay nɨg yelak. Yelaknɨŋ agɨnak, Klays nop gos lɨnepin agɨnak. Apan tek, kɨles gɨl yɨbɨl ge amek nɨm, pel pelnep yenɨgaban.
